Uses of Class
letters.Letter

  • Packages that use Letter 
    Package Description
    letters
    This package contains all the different kinds of letters
    people
    This package gives all the information about someone that will send or receive a letter

    • Uses of Letter in letters

      Classes in letters with type parameters of type Letter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DecoratingLetter<L extends Letter<?>>
      Decorator to add specific features to a letter such as Registered letter and Urgent letter
      class  RegisteredLetter<C extends Letter<?>>
      Class with defines a RegisteredLetter which once it's received trigger the sending of a receipt of acknowledgment
      class  UrgentLetter<C extends Letter<?>>
      Class which define an UrgentLetter that cost twice as much as the letter sent
      Subclasses of Letter in letters 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DecoratingLetter<L extends Letter<?>>
      Decorator to add specific features to a letter such as Registered letter and Urgent letter
      class  PromissaryNote
      Class which defines a PromissaryNote which is a letter with a money content
      class  ReceiptAcknowledgmentLetter
      Class which define a ReceiptAcknoledgmentLetter which is sent when someone receives a registered letter
      class  RegisteredLetter<C extends Letter<?>>
      Class with defines a RegisteredLetter which once it's received trigger the sending of a receipt of acknowledgment
      class  SimpleLetter
      Class which defines a SimpleLetter which is a letter with a text content
      class  ThanksLetter
      Class which defines a ThanksLetter which is sent when an inhabitant receives a PromissaryNote
      class  UrgentLetter<C extends Letter<?>>
      Class which define an UrgentLetter that cost twice as much as the letter sent
      Constructors in letters with parameters of type Letter 
      Constructor and Description
      DecoratingLetter(Letter<?> l)
      Constructor of a DecoratingLetter, which initializes the DecoratingLetter with the letter given in parameters
      RegisteredLetter(Letter<?> l)
      Constructor of the RegisteredLetter which make the letter given in parameters registered
      UrgentLetter(Letter<?> l)
      Constructor of the UrgentLetter which initializes the letter given in parameters as urgent

    • Uses of Letter in people

      Methods in people that return types with arguments of type Letter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Letter<?>> City.getPostBox() 
      Methods in people with parameters of type Letter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Inhabitant.receiveLetter(Letter<?> letter)
      Shows that an inhabitant has received a letter
      void Inhabitant.sendLetter(Letter<?> l)
      Sends the letter by adding it to the postBox of the City
      void City.sendLetter(Letter<?> l)
      Adds the letter given in parameters to the postBox of the city
